about.details:
Incorporated in 2014, Olatech Solutions Limited is engaged in the business of Data Centre, Enterprise, Telecom and IT Software solutions in the OSS - BSS (Operations Support System and Business Support System) segment. The company's software solutions are offered under the registered trademark "Epiphany".

Olatech Solutions Limited offers software solutions such as NOC tools, Network Monitoring, Management & Analytics, System Integration Services, Telecom Tower Installation, Network Deployment, Server Virtualization Services, IT Equipment Installation and Management Services, Data Centre Infrastructure Management Solutions, etc. The company has clients across different verticals such as Telcos, ISPs, Enterprises, Data Centre Service Providers and Public Sector.

The company is an ISO 9001:2015 certified company for software development, hardware deployment services, telecom services of installation & commissioning, telecom projects, software training, and government & non-government IT projects.

Competitive Strengths :

  • Experienced Promoter and a well-trained employee base.
  • The company's solutions are robust, trusted & industry proven.
  • Technology and Quality Certifications.
  • Strengthen human capital.
  • Cost Advantage and Centre of Excellence.

faqs.question: What is the Olatech Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer:
Olatech Solutions IPO is a SME IPO of 700000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹1.89 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹27 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on August 12, 2022, and closes on August 19, 2022.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Olatech Solutions IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Olatech Solutions IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Olatech Solutions IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Olatech Solutions IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Olatech Solutions IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Olatech Solutions IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Olatech Solutions IPO opens on August 12, 2022 and closes on August 19, 2022.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Olatech Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: Olatech Solutions IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Olatech Solutions IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Olatech Solutions IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Olatech Solutions IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Olatech Solutions IPO will be done on Wednesday, August 24, 2022, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Friday, August 26, 2022. Check the Olatech Solutions IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Olatech Solutions IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Olatech Solutions IPO listing date is on Monday, August 29, 2022.
